info.task: navigate backwards to collapsed select-only combobox
info.title: Navigate backwards to a collapsed select-only combobox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusAfterCombobox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the Combobox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the Combobox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Favorite Fruit' Combobox.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Favorite Fruit' Combobox.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Text of the selected option ('Choose a Fruit') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
